name: Spunchbop - Patty Catastrophe
description:
A stupid game that I'm using to learn unity and thought might as well upload it.

The resolution should be fixed now! Thanks for the reports on the discord.

Next is if you are looking at the NPC and you walk away a certain distance, then the chat will exit automatically.

Lastly, the select dialogue button is Q, not enter anymore, the controls still say enter, I apologize it will be fixed soon.

And yes, after the first part of the game more content will be added and is already being worked on.
